LanguageData.VFED_MissileRain.label: explosive snowstorm
LanguageData.VFED_DivineInferno.label: Spirit Onslaught
LanguageData.VFED_DivineInferno.description: Santa has initiated a Spirit Onslaught protocol on your colony and are moving all required slicer ribbon satellites into position. Once they meet over your colony, they will glass it with numerous pillars of concentrated blazing christmas spirit. This can be prevented by reducing your visibility back to Hidden visibility level.
